user_question: How can I make a sourdough starter from scratch and generate an image of a rustic sourdough loaf?
final_answer: To make a sourdough starter: Day 1: Mix 1 cup whole wheat flour with 1/2 cup water. Day 2-5: Discard half, add 1 cup all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup water daily. Image of a rustic sourdough loaf generated. The optimal temperature for maintaining a sourdough starter is around 70°F (21°C).
